name: Sauna Run
description:
Gather your towel (for decency's sake if nothing else), your ladel, and your vihta, and hurry on down for a nice relaxing afternoon at your local sauna. Mind the bear, though.

Made with a group for a two-day game jam during a 2017 game dev workshop in Turku, Finland.

Controls: Arrow Keys - movement; Space Bar - jump; S - Smack
